'''Treasure Map Fragment''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained from 4 conches around [[Tsurumi Island]]. The fragments are used in the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[A Gift To Shitoki, Wrapped In Conches]]'', where they are converted into [[A Treasure Map Left for Shitoki]].
